attributes.action: Bring back national service for 'trouble makers' and those who do not go onto futher education or an apprenticeship/YTS
attributes.additional_details:
Trouble makers/Teenagers who refuse to go onto further education or an apprenticeship/YTS and instead of sending troubled teenagers to youth prisons, should be made to complete 2 years national service.  This will teach them discipline, respect, self-respect give them motivation,
opportunities, skills, hope.  All the things they say they are not receiving from the goverment.
